contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 5, 2020 D Emmental March Contest
Emmental March Contest 0 March Contest
emmental-march-contest
None
Oberburg, BE, Switzerland Bands play a March and also a not ranked Chorale. (sep. Brass/Wind and 2 Categories A & B = max. 30 Bands)
Brass Band A: 5 Bands Brass Band B: 12 Bands Wind Band A: 2 Bands Wind Band B: 11 Bands
If the Event finally can happen depends on the further Development of CoVid19 (Pandemic in Spring). Most certainly Events up to 1000 People, not sure Events 1000+ possible from September.
Oct. 22, 2019, 3:58 p.m. May 24, 2020, 12:26 p.m.
